<!-- goal philosophy -->
<div class="content">
<h4 style="color:#051729;line-height:50px;font-weight:600;">
PROTECTING ICONIC SPECIES
</h4>

<h5 style="font-size:23px">
This subgoal captures the status of species that are important to a region because they are relevant to local cultural identity.
</h5>

<h5>
Iconic species symbolize the cultural, spiritual, aesthetic and other intangible benefits that people value in the Baltic Sea.
</h5>

<br>
</div>


<!-- goal infographics -->

```{r include = FALSE, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width = 11) 

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)

scores <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OHI-Baltic/bhi/master/index/scorelist.csv") %>% 
  filter(region_id == "BHI-000", year == 2020) %>% 
  select(dimension, goal, score)
```


<div class="rgncontainer">
<div class="rgnmap" style="background-color:#f2f4f5f7;width:49.5%;height:100%;padding:10px;">
```{r, echo = FALSE}
ggplot(filter(scores, goal == "ICO", dimension == "score")) +
  geom_rect(aes(xmin = 0, xmax = 100, ymin = 0, ymax = 100), fill = "#dbe4eb") +
  geom_rect(aes(xmin = 0, xmax = score, ymin = 0, ymax = score), fill = "#629ec1", color = NA) +
  geom_text(aes(x = score/2, y = score/2, label = round(score)), size = 65, color = "#f9fafb", family = "Impact") +
  theme_void() 
```
<br>
<br>
<p style="text-align:center">
The overall Baltic score average for the Iconic Species subgoal 
<br>
is 88 out of 100.
</p>

</div>

<div class="rgnmap" style="background-color:#f2f4f5f7;width:49.5%;height:100%;padding:10px;">
```{r, echo = FALSE}
scores %>% 
  filter(goal == "ICO", dimension %in% c("future", "score")) %>% 
  tidyr::pivot_wider(names_from = "dimension",  values_from = "score") %>% 
  mutate(score_diff = (future-score)/score*100) %>% 
  mutate(score_diff = paste(ifelse(score_diff > 0, "+", ""), round(score_diff),  "%")) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_rect(aes(xmin = 0, xmax = 100, ymin = 0, ymax = 100), fill = "#bcd1dfb3", color = NA) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(0, 100)) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 100)) +
  geom_text(aes(x = 50, y = 50, label = score_diff), size = 55, color = "#629ec1", family = "Impact") +
  theme_void()
```
<br>
<br>
<p style="text-align:center">
It is estimated that in the near future the score for the Iconic Species subgoal will improve roughly 7%
</p>

</div>
</div>

<!-- some text about the goal -->

<div class="content">
<h4 style="color:#051729;line-height:50px;font-weight:600;">
WHAT DOES THIS SCORE MEAN?
</h4>

An international survey in 2021, directed to scientists, stakeholders and general public from all Baltic countries identified a subset of species as culturally significant in the region, including fish, benthic invertebrates, marine mammals, water plants and birds.

A high score indicates that species are categorized as of ’least concern’ according to the Red List criteria of the International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN).

Estimation of rare species could be improved to more confidently represent distributions of species around the Baltic Sea.

<br>
</div>
